mainContent.searchText1: This is where the phytosanitary certificate is issued, if one is needed.
mainContent.searchText2: If the country, state or territory is not part of the International Plant Protection Convention, it is not included in this service.

getHelpSection.betabannertext2: will help us to improve it.

paragraphs.a: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
paragraphs.b: We'd also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.

headings.d: Do you want to accept analytics cookies?

table2.text4: Collects site usage information from the user
table2.text7: Collects site usage information from the user
table2.text9: Used to reduce the number of requests.

paragraphs.a: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
paragraphs.b: We use cookies to make this site work and collect information about how you use our service.
paragraphs.c: These cookies are used across the Check local air quality website.
paragraphs.d: We only set cookies when JavaScript is running in your browser and you’ve accepted them. If you choose not to run Javascript, the information on this page will not apply to you.
paragraphs.h: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use this service. We do not need to ask permission to use them.
paragraphs.i: With your permission, we use Google Analytics to collect data about how you use this service. This information helps us to improve our service.
paragraphs.j: Google is not allowed to use or share our analytics data with anyone.
paragraphs.k: We do not allow Google to use or share our analytics data.
paragraphs.l: Google Analytics stores anonymised information about:
paragraphs.n: how long you spend on each page
paragraphs.o: how you arrived at the site
paragraphs.p: what you click on while you visit the site
paragraphs.q: the device and browser you use

errors.searchErrorListText1: Enter the name of the country, state or territory you are importing
